pages.text: $(li)The Gunpowder is a item that can be used to craft Gunpowder Blocks, Gunpowder Sacks, Fire Charges, Splash Potion Bottles, Spring Launcher and TNT.$(br)$(li)They can be used to convert a Potion into a Splash Potion too.

$(li)The Gunpowder can be obtained as a loot in the Dungeons, Desert Temples, Woodland Mansions and Shipwreck Supply chests.$(br)$(li)They can be dropped by Creppers, Ghasts, Gooms, Griefers and Witchs.
